docs.lead_paragraph: Nixon Administration plans to seek legislation that would require the elderly to pay a sharply increased share of their hospital costs, a change that seems sure to trigger opposition from senior citizens and to lead to a fight in Congress.

headline.main: Budget Plan Would Raise Hospital Costs of Elderly; Budget Plan WouldRaise Elderly's Hospital Costs Funds Withheld

docs.snippet: Nixon Administration plans to seek legislation that would require the elderly to pay a sharply increased share of their hospital costs, a change that seems sure to trigger opposition from senior citizens and to lead to a fight in Congress.

byline.original: By RICHARD D. LYONSSpecial to The New York Times
